item.title: hu-chu-su-jeong⭐️
item.description: As part of the final project for my mobile programming class, I developed a real-time screen translation application. I mainly participated as a front-end developer, including creating buttons that float on the screen. I participated in and completed the 1st Open Source SW Hackathon held at the same time and won the grand prize.

item.title: KEUNSARAM Project management application
item.description: In the summer of 2023, we participated in our own design activities and won the top prize. Implementation goals, study configuration, implementation configuration, etc. in situations where there is no prior knowledge of Android app development, crawling, and API. Everyone planned and carried out the project themselves.
